Never had any problem with a skidrow release before but I can't get this game to work this time around. When I first installed, the game crashed when I tried to start a new game and and after a second installation the game just won't start. :(

After playing the first part, I was also unable to  start a new game when installing DTOV, so I tried this and it worked (btw I'm running Windows 7 32-bit).

- Uninstall Deathspank.

- Go to "C:\Users\\AppData\Local" and delete the SKIDROW folder.

- Go to "C:\Users\\AppData\Local" and delete the Hothead folder.

- Install Deathspank: Thongs of Virtue as per the instructions from SKIDROW and this time it should work (this will not solve the leaderboard error though).

Hey guys, I'm having some problems with the graphics. I keep getting artifacts on main menu button's, the in-game hud, inventory, item icons, quest page etc. and the intro logo's (EA, Hothead Games). The game world runs perfectly, with only a few artifacts in the 'horizon'. My graphics card (ATI Radeon X1600) can handle Medal of Honor, L4D2, Splinter Cell Conviction, ... perfectly, and I seem to have the exact same problem when running the first Deathspank game. Anyone know of a fix?

Nvm guys, I fixed it
Anyone having problems with their ATI-card, try downloading the ATY Catalyst Legacy driver
http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/windows/Legacy/Pages/radeonaiw_vista32.aspx
Vista version works fine for Windows 7
